meta.title: 3.43: The December Email: A Time Capsule of Systemic Chaos (10 December 2024)

narrative.summary: Contextual write-up explaining the use of reference 701211 and documenting the cascading impact (incl. surgery decision) amid fractured records.

highlights.text: I decided I couldn't have an operation which involved me being bed bound for months.
highlights.note: Health and civil-claim impact linked to unresolved stalking and safeguarding failures.

sections.heading: Why 701211?
sections.content: Explains the legacy reference usage and attempts to maintain continuity across fractured police records.

sections.heading: Immediate Aftermath
sections.content: Points to 12–19 Dec 2024 Cordell email thread (witness, scheduling) that followed this position.

sections.heading: Impact
sections.content: Details practical harms — e.g., surgery decision — and links to civil-claim consequences.

append_log.change: Initial creation of 3.43 analysis entry as non-evidence.
